name: Thule Snowpack Extender
description: Baby your boards on the way to the hill. The ultra-soft rubber arms on this carrier slide out over the side of your vehicle for easy loading and unloading once you're at your destination.Oversized push buttons are easy to operate with gloves on.Rack extends out when open and locks in place when closed.2 single-key locks secure skis to the carrier and the carrier to the vehicle.75cm loading platform fits up to 6 pairs of skis or 4 snowboards.Speedlink and T-Track hardware mounts quickly and securely.Fits Thule® rack systems, round bars, and most factory racks.
